name: TypeScript
description: I began developing web applications in JavaScript in 2015, around the time Angular switched to using TypeScript by default. In 2018, I learned to build Angular web applications with TypeScript.

name: Spring
description: In 2018, Khan Bank JSC, where I was employed, decided to transition from a monolithic architecture to a microservice architecture. As a member of the transition team, I was responsible for developing microservices using Spring Boot.

name: React
description: The most impactful applications I've developed are banking web and mobile applications for 1.5 million Khan Bank customers, built with React and React Native.

name: React Native
description: The most impactful applications I've developed are banking web and mobile applications for 1.5 million Khan Bank customers, built with React and React Native. In 2015, when React Native was first released, I experiemented with React Native and built a small Instagram clone application.

name: Angular
description: When I was working for Khan Bank JSC over 40 reusable UI components and 8 modules for a banking intranet web application using Angular. I also led a project to convert these Angular components and modules into npm packages.

name: Flutter & Dart
description: In 2021, I developed a mobile order management app for sales representatives using Flutter, which included 8 different modules such as promotion, task management, order management, shopping cart and user profiles.

name: Django & Python
description: In 2016, while starting my career as a software engineer and pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, I developed web applications for sports and music streaming.

name: Redux
description: Redux is my go-to state management tool for React and React Native applications.
